compatibility.notes: The OFL-1.0-no-RFN license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and license in all distributions.
Change the font names of any derivative works.
Obtain explicit permission to use Reserved Font Names in Modified Versions.
license.name: OFL-1.0-no-RFN
obligations: The Font Software or any of its components cannot be sold by itself.
Each copy of the Font Software must include the copyright notice and the license.
Modified Versions cannot use the Reserved Font Name(s) without permission.
The names of the Copyright Holder or Author(s) cannot be used for promotion without permission.
